trans-unit.source: Ultimately, when: 'string' will always evaluate as True and when: not 'string' will always evaluate as False, as long as 'string' is not empty, even if the value of 'string' itself looks like a boolean. For users with playbooks that depend on the old behavior, we added a config setting that preserves it. You can use the ANSIBLE_CONDITIONAL_BARE_VARS environment variable or conditional_bare_variables in the defaults section of ansible.cfg to select the behavior you want on your control node. The default setting is true, which preserves the old behavior. Set the config value or environment variable to false to start using the new option.
trans-unit.target: 最终， when: 'string' 将始终评估为 True 而 when: not 'string' 总是会评估为 False ，只要 'string' 不为空，即使值 'string' 本身看起来像一个布尔值。对于具有依赖于旧行为的剧本的用户，我们添加了保留它的配置设置。您可以使用 ANSIBLE_CONDITIONAL_BARE_VARS 环境变量或 conditional_bare_variables 在 defaults 的部分 ansible.cfg 来选择你的控制节点上，你想要的行为。默认设置为 true ，保留了旧的行为。将配置值或环境变量设置为 false 即可开始使用新选项。

trans-unit.source: Unlike most Ansible modules, network modules do not run on the managed nodes. From a user’s point of view, network modules work like any other modules. They work with ad-hoc commands, playbooks, and roles. Behind the scenes, however, network modules use a different methodology than the other (Linux/Unix and Windows) modules use. Ansible is written and executed in Python. Because the majority of network devices can not run Python, the Ansible network modules are executed on the Ansible control node, where ansible or ansible-playbook runs.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数Ansible模块不同，网络模块不在受管节点上运行。从用户的角度来看，网络模块的工作方式与其他任何模块一样。它们可用于临时命令，剧本和角色。但是，在后台，网络模块使用的方法不同于其他模块（Linux / Unix和Windows）。Ansible用Python编写和执行。因为大多数网络设备不能运行Python中，Ansible网络模块在Ansible控制节点，其中，上执行 ansible 或 ansible-playbook 运行。

trans-unit.target: 使用community.windows.win_scheduled_task配置计划的任务。

trans-unit.source: Use win_scheduled_task to configure a scheduled task.
trans-unit.target: 使用win_scheduled_task配置计划的任务。

trans-unit.source: Use <-loopback> to stop automatically bypassing the proxy when connecting through any loopback address like 127.0.0.1, localhost, or the local hostname.
trans-unit.target: 通过任何环回地址（例如 127.0.0.1 ， localhost 或本地主机名）连接时，使用 <-loopback> 可以停止自动绕过代理。

trans-unit.source: Use <local> to match hostnames that are not fully qualified domain names. This is useful when needing to connect to intranet sites using just the hostname.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <local> 匹配不是完全限定域名的主机名。当仅需要使用主机名连接到Intranet站点时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: Use <local> to match hostnames that are not fully qualified domain names. This is useful when needing to connect to intranet sites using just the hostname. If defined, this should be the last entry in the bypass list.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <local> 匹配不是完全限定域名的主机名。当仅需要使用主机名连接到Intranet站点时，这很有用。如果定义，这应该是旁路列表中的最后一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Use (present to create or update an Environment and absent to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 使用 (present 创建或更新环境， absent 删除环境。

trans-unit.source: Use 1 for <=2.1, 2 for ==2.2, 3 for ==2.3.
trans-unit.target: 使用 1 为<= 2.1， 2 为== 2.2， 3 为== 2.3。

trans-unit.source: Use EDGE for an edge optimized API endpoint, REGIONAL for just a regional deploy or PRIVATE for a private API.
trans-unit.target: 将 EDGE 用于边缘优化的API端点，将 REGIONAL 仅用于区域部署，将 PRIVATE 用于私有API。

trans-unit.source: Use ProxyCommand only if you absolutely must
trans-unit.target: 仅在绝对必要时使用 ProxyCommand

trans-unit.source: Use absent for Deleting Azure Recovery Service Vault.
trans-unit.target: 使用 absent 删除Azure恢复服务库。

trans-unit.source: Use absent for Deleting Backup Policy.
trans-unit.target: 使用 absent 删除备份策略。

trans-unit.source: Use all to install all packages available on informed repository_path.
trans-unit.target: 使用 all 安装所有已通知的 repository_path 上可用的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Use all to populate all the properties of the virtual machine. The value all is time consuming operation, do not use unless required absolutely.
trans-unit.target: 使用 all 填充虚拟机的所有属性。值 all 费时的操作，除非绝对需要，否则不要使用。

trans-unit.source: Use ansible-doc -l to see the list of available modules. Use ansible-doc <name> to see specific documentation and examples, this should note if the module has a corresponding action plugin.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ansible-doc -l 查看可用模块的列表。使用 ansible-doc <name> 来查看特定的文档和示例，这应该注意模块是否具有相应的动作插件。

trans-unit.source: Use argv to avoid quoting values that would otherwise be interpreted incorrectly (for example "user name").
trans-unit.target: 使用 argv 避免引用否则会被错误解释的值（例如“用户名”）。

trans-unit.source: Use auto for automatically assigning a drive letter, or a letter A-Z for manually assigning a drive letter to a new partition. If not specified, no drive letter is assigned when creating a new partition.
trans-unit.target: 使用 auto 自动分配驱动器号，或使用字母AZ手动分配驱动器号到新分区。如果未指定，则在创建新分区时未分配驱动器号。

trans-unit.source: Use auto_legacy. This setting lets Ansible find and use the workaround Python on hosts that have it, while also finding the correct default Python on newer hosts. But remember, the default will change in 4 releases.
trans-unit.target: 使用 auto_legacy 。使用此设置，Ansible可以在拥有它的主机上找到并使用替代方法Python，同时还可以在较新的主机上找到正确的默认Python。但是请记住，默认值将在4个发行版中更改。

trans-unit.source: Use backup for on-demand backup.
trans-unit.target: 使用 backup 进行按需备份。

trans-unit.source: Use become on the task with the credentials of the user that needs access to the remote resource
trans-unit.target: 利用 become 该任务与需要访问远程资源的用户的凭据

trans-unit.source: Use become to bypass all WinRM restrictions and run a command as it would locally. Unlike using an authentication transport like credssp, this will also remove the non-interactive restriction and API restrictions like WUA and DPAPI
trans-unit.target: 使用 become 可以绕过所有WinRM限制并像在本地一样运行命令。与使用诸如 credssp 之类的身份验证传输方式不同，这还将消除非交互式限制和API限制（例如WUA和DPAPI）

trans-unit.source: Use become, which runs a command as it would when run locally. This will bypass most WinRM restrictions, as Windows is unaware the process is running under WinRM when become is used. See the Understanding privilege escalation: become documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用 become ，它将像在本地运行时那样运行命令。这将绕过最WinRM的限制，因为Windows不知道该过程的WinRM下运行时 become 被使用。请参阅了解特权升级：成为文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Use build to build the image from a Dockerfile. build.path must be specified when this value is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 build 从 Dockerfile 构建映像。使用此值时必须指定build.path。

trans-unit.source: Use connection: ansible.netcommon.network_cli and become: yes
trans-unit.target: 使用 connection: ansible.netcommon.network_cli 并 become: yes

trans-unit.source: Use create for enabling protection for the Azure VM.
trans-unit.target: 使用 create 启用对Azure VM的保护。

trans-unit.source: Use customValue to populate virtual machine's custom attributes. customValue is only supported by vCenter and not by ESXi.
trans-unit.target: 使用 customValue 填充虚拟机的自定义属性。仅vCenter支持 customValue ，而ESXi不支持customValue。

trans-unit.source: Use delete for stop protection and delete data.
trans-unit.target: 使用 delete 进行停止保护并删除数据。

trans-unit.source: Use deploy to deploy schema template.
trans-unit.target: 使用 deploy 部署架构模板。

trans-unit.source: Use drs_default_vm_behavior of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs instead.
trans-unit.target: 请 drs_default_vm_behavior community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs的drs_default_vm_behavior。

trans-unit.source: Use drs_enable_vm_behavior_overrides of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs instead.
trans-unit.target: 请 drs_enable_vm_behavior_overrides community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs的drs_enable_vm_behavior_overrides。

trans-unit.source: Use drs_vmotion_rate of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs instead.
trans-unit.target: 请 drs_vmotion_rate community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs的drs_vmotion_rate。

trans-unit.source: Use enable_drs of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs instead.
trans-unit.target: 请 enable_drs community.vmware.vmware_cluster_drs的enable_drs。

trans-unit.source: Use enable_ha of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_ha instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用community.vmware.vmware_cluster_ha的 enable_ha 。

trans-unit.source: Use enable_vsan of community.vmware.vmware_cluster_vsan instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用community.vmware.vmware_cluster_vsan的 enable_vsan 。

trans-unit.source: Use get_checksum=yes with checksum_algorithm=md5 to return an md5 hash under the checksum return value.
trans-unit.target: 将 get_checksum=yes 与 checksum_algorithm=md5 一起使用，以在 checksum 返回值下返回md5哈希。

trans-unit.source: Use groups/cpm in module_defaults to set common options used between CPM modules.

trans-unit.source: Use pipelining. When pipelining is enabled, Ansible does not save the module to a temporary file on the client. Instead it pipes the module to the remote python interpreter’s stdin. Pipelining does not work for python modules involving file transfer (for example: copy, fetch, template), or for non-python modules.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pipelining 。启用流水线后，Ansible不会将模块保存到客户端上的临时文件中。而是将模块通过管道传递到远程python解释器的stdin。管道传输不适用于涉及文件传输的python模块（例如：copy，fetch，template）或非python模块。

trans-unit.source: Use pipelining. When pipelining is enabled, Ansible does not save the module to a temporary file on the client. trans-unit.target: 使用 pipelining 。启用流水线后，Ansible不会将模块保存到客户端上的临时文件中。而是将模块通过管道传递到远程python解释器的stdin。管道传输不适用于涉及文件传输的python模块（例如：copy，fetch，template）或非python模块。

trans-unit.source: Use Galaxy to jump-start your automation project with great content from the Ansible community. Galaxy provides pre-packaged units of work such as roles, and new in Galaxy 3.2, collections You can find roles for provisioning infrastructure, deploying applications, and all of the tasks you do everyday. The collection format provides a comprehensive package of automation that may include multiple playbooks, roles, modules, and plugins.
trans-unit.target: 使用Galaxy从Ansible社区中获得丰富的内容来启动您的自动化项目。Galaxy提供了预打包的工作单元，例如role和Galaxy 3.2中的新增功能，集合。您可以找到用于供应基础结构，部署应用程序以及日常执行的所有任务的角色。收集格式提供了全面的自动化程序包，其中可能包含多个剧本，角色，模块和插件。

trans-unit.source: Use snapshots to back up data from your persistent disks. trans-unit.source: Use state present to create or update a container and upload or download a blob. If the container does not exist, it will be created. If a blob (uploading) or a file (downloading) already exists, it will not be overwritten unless force=true.
trans-unit.target: 使用 present 状态创建或更新容器以及上传或下载Blob。如果该容器不存在，将创建它。如果存在，它将使用配置选项进行更新。提供Blob名称以及src或dest以上传或下载。提供要上传的src路径和要下载的dest路径。如果blob（正在上传）或文件（正在下载）已经存在，则除非force = true，否则不会覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Use the value default to set the cipher suite to the system default. trans-unit.target: 使用 default 值将密码套件设置为系统默认值。此值等效于指定 ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256, ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384,ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA,ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA, ECDHE-RSA-AES128-SHA256,ECDHE-RSA-AES256-SHA384,ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256, ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384,ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA,ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA, ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-SHA256,ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-SHA384,AES128-GCM-SHA256, AES256-GCM-SHA384,AES128-SHA,AES256-SHA,AES128-SHA256,AES256-SHA256, ECDHE-RSA-DES-CBC3-SHA,ECDHE-ECDSA-DES-CBC3-SHA,DES-CBC3-SHA 。

trans-unit.source: Use the variable name from the vars file in your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: 使用剧本中 vars 文件中的变量名。

trans-unit.source: Use the virtual ip as the snat ip for health monitoring and sending traffic to the backend servers instead of the service engine interface ip.
trans-unit.target: 使用虚拟ip作为snat ip进行健康监控,并向后端服务器发送流量,而不是服务引擎接口ip。

trans-unit.source: Use this SSH keys to login to Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 使用此SSH密钥登录到虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: Use this TCP port when connecting to server.
trans-unit.target: 连接到 server 时使用此TCP端口。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to specify one or more lines that should be ignored during the diff.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个参数来指定在差异过程中应该被忽略的一行或多行。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to specify one or more lines that should be ignored during the diff. This is used for lines in the configuration that are automatically updated by the system. This argument takes a list of regular expressions or exact line matches.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个参数来指定在差异过程中应该被忽略的一行或多行。这个参数用于配置中由系统自动更新的行。这个参数接收一个正则表达式列表或精确的行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Use this argument to specify one or more lines that should be ignored during the diff. This is used for lines in the configuration that are automatically updated by the system. This argument takes a list of regular expressions or exact line matches. Note that this parameter will be ignored if the platform has onbox diff support.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个参数来指定在差异过程中应该被忽略的一行或多行。这个参数用于配置中由系统自动更新的行。这个参数需要一个正则表达式的列表或精确的行匹配。注意,如果平台支持onbox diff,这个参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Use this callback to sort through extensive debug output
trans-unit.target: 使用这个回调来整理大量的调试输出。

trans-unit.source: Use this callback when you dont care about OK nor Skipped.
trans-unit.target: 当你不关心 "确定 "或 "跳过 "时,使用这个回调。
